title: Kitadake & Manotake
marks:
Signature, Title,  Marks, Inscription, and Label
 LLC: [ よし田 ] {Yoshida}; Lower margin in pencil: {K
description: a group of men gathered around campfire with kettle at LR; man sitting inside brown tent near center; dark, snowy landscape in middle ground with mountains and looming clouds in background
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
